doc.previous: When hexachloroplatinic acid is heated it decomposes through platinum IV chloride and platinum II chloride to elemental platinum although the reactions do not occur stepwise 30
doc.after: All three reactions are reversible Platinum II and platinum IV bromides are known as well Platinum hexafluoride is a strong oxidizer capable of oxidizing oxygen
